segment.source: View System and Recording Information
segment.target: View System and Recording Information

segment.source: View System and Recording Information
segment.target: View System and Recording Information

segment.source: View System and Recording Information
segment.target: View System and Recording Information

segment.source: You can view system and recording information for the recording that you currently have open in Windows Performance Analyzer (WPA).
segment.target: You can view system and recording information for the recording that you currently have open in Windows Performance Analyzer (WPA).

segment.source: To view system information
segment.target: To view system information

segment.source: On the Trace menu, select System Configuration.
segment.target: On the Trace menu, select System Configuration.

segment.source: Select the appropriate tab to view any of the following:
segment.target: Select the appropriate tab to view any of the following:

segment.source: General: General information about the computer on which the recording was made.
segment.target: General: General information about the computer on which the recording was made.

segment.source: Traces: Information about the recording that is currently displayed.
segment.target: Traces: Information about the recording that is currently displayed.

segment.source: Storage: Information about the storage devices that are available on the computer.
segment.target: Storage: Information about the storage devices that are available on the computer.

segment.source: Display: Information about the display capabilities of the computer.
segment.target: Display: Information about the display capabilities of the computer.

segment.source: Network: Information about the network of the computer.
segment.target: Network: Information about the network of the computer.

segment.source: Services: Information about the services that are available on the computer.
segment.target: Services: Information about the services that are available on the computer.

segment.source: IRQ: Information about interrupt requests in the recording.
segment.target: IRQ: Information about interrupt requests in the recording.

segment.source: PnP: Information about Plug and Play devices that are attached to the computer.
segment.target: PnP: Information about Plug and Play devices that are attached to the computer.

segment.source: Security
segment.target: Security

segment.source: Be careful when you share Windows Performance Recorder (WPR) files.
segment.target: Be careful when you share Windows Performance Recorder (WPR) files.

segment.source: These files contain very detailed information about the system on which they were recorded.
segment.target: These files contain very detailed information about the system on which they were recorded.
